posts.Title: Coinbase paused transactions in US for hours to address bank transfer issues
posts.Description: Coinbase temporarily stopped transactions for users in the US due to an issue preventing the company from processing withdrawals or deposits involving bank accounts.
posts.Author: Emma Roth

posts.Title: Telegram cuts subscription fee by more than half in india
posts.Description: Telegram has cut the monthly subscription fee for its premium tier by more than half in India, just months after introducing the offering as it attempts to aggressively cash in on a large user base in one of its biggest markets.
posts.Author: Manish Singh

posts.Title: Something Weird Is Going on With Mark Zuckerberg and Saturday’s UFC Fight
posts.Description: Meta CEO Mark Zuckerberg can’t duck and weave the jabbing questions that he’s responsible for buying out the entire arena for a major UFC show this Saturday.
posts.Author: Kyle Barr
